job_title: JBPM/Java Developer (Senior jBPM consultant with Java experience OR Camunda BPM)

job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field

jd: From: AKHIL, Quanterian technologies tejaswini@quanterian.com Reply to: tejaswini@quanterian.com Job Title: JBPM/Java Developer (Senior jBPM consultant with Java experience OR Camunda BPM)Job Location: Hybrid with onsite at Irving, TX - 2 days (Tues, Thurs)F2F INTERVIEW in any one Verizon office location either Irving (Texas), Ashburn (Virginia), Bedminister (NJ) Qualifications:Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field.Minimum [10] years of experience in software development.We need jBPM as one of the core skills with Camunda as an alternative. In addition to it we are looking for :Primary skills: jBPM, Core Java, multi-threaded programming skills, micro services, OracleSecondary: ReactJS, Kubernetes, Cassandra, AWS cloudPrevious experience in a managerial or leadership role is preferred.. Key Responsibilities:- Architecture Design: Lead the design and architecture of workflow solutions using JBPM or Camunda, ensuring scalability and efficiency.- Coding: Actively participate in coding during the initial phases of the project, contributing to the development of Java-based applications.- Performance Improvement: Analyze existing workflows and implement strategies for performance enhancement and optimization.- Project Management: Manage sprints and oversee project timelines, ensuring that deliverables meet quality standards and deadlines.- Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, provide technical guidance, and ensure alignment on project goals.- Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of architectural designs, coding standards, and best practices.
